data.question: What is the empirical formula of Cd-DP?
What technique was used for the synthesis of MOFs from pyridyl and carboxylic acid linkers?
At what temperature were the TGA profiles for the MOFs recorded?
What is the crystal system of Zn-DA?
What method was used for the preparation of photoresponsive MON-Ormosil composite film?
data.answer: Sol-gel preparation method developed by Levy and co-workers

data.question: What was the thickness of the Cd-DP MON-ormosil composite film as revealed by SEM analysis?
What was the purpose of gold sputtering the Cd-DP MON-ormosil composite film before SEM analysis?
data.answer: To prevent excessive charging of the system due to accumulation of static electric fields

data.question: What was observed when the DP linker-doped ormosil film was immersed in ethanol?
data.answer: The ethanolic solution turned pale yellow with the appearance of p* absorption bands typical of the DP linker, indicating leaching of the DP linker from the ormosil film

data.question: What was the result of the photostability experiments with the exfoliated MOFs?
data.answer: The absorption spectra of the MOFs remained virtually the same even after five cycles of irradiation and thermal decay, attesting to the stability of the robust coordination frameworks toward photochemical fatigue

data.question: What was the main finding from the dynamic light scattering (DLS) experiments on the ethanolic suspension of Cd-DP?
data.answer: The mean particle size of the material decreased gradually with increasing ultrasonication time, indicating that ultrasonication leads to delamination of the aggregated 2D sheets
